MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to complete a repair on an underground cable on Shottskirk Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 4:07 PM on Wednesday, 28 October 2020.
